action.action-desc: Mr. Soto (for himself and Mr. Crist) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

form.official-title: To ensure reliable observation of hurricanes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Ensuring the Reliability of Our Hurricane Hunter Aircraft Act.

The Under Secretary for Oceans and Atmosphere of the Department of Commerce shall secure and maintain secondary backup capability for each class of hurricane reconnaissance, research, surveillance, and response aircraft sufficient to prevent a single point of failure.
There are authorized to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out this Act.
